overview_summary: All five neighboring landowners have no clearly documented stance on the development (each is classified as "unknown"). None holds high public office or major influence; only two show moderate community engagement (a local library volunteer and a small business owner), while the rest maintain low profiles in local affairs.

neighbors.name: Carol Serazio
neighbors.claims: Carol Serazio is a retired preschool teacher who lives in Coxsackie, New York [Heart of Catskill Assoc.](https://cat-n-around.com/cat-n-around-catskill/2021-catskill-cats/2021-18-carol-m-serazio-polish-folk-art-cat/). She stays active locally by serving on a library board and volunteering with the Greene County Historical Society [Heart of Catskill Assoc.](https://cat-n-around.com/cat-n-around-catskill/2021-catskill-cats/2021-18-carol-m-serazio-polish-folk-art-cat/). In 2021, Serazio painted a “Polish Folk Art Cat” statue for Catskill’s annual Cat’n Around public art exhibit [Heart of Catskill Assoc.](https://cat-n-around.com/cat-n-around-catskill/2021-catskill-cats/2021-18-carol-m-serazio-polish-folk-art-cat/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a local cultural figure or historian reach out to her, stressing respect for the town’s heritage and scenic character to align with her community interests.

neighbors.name: Barbara L. Cook
neighbors.claims: Barbara L. Cook is a landowner in the vicinity, but she does not hold any known public positions or roles [Town of Coxsackie](https://coxsackie.org/minutes/). No references to her were found in local meetings or news, indicating she keeps a very low profile in the community [Town of Coxsackie](https://coxsackie.org/minutes/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach through a trusted neighbor in a one-on-one setting, emphasizing that the project will respect her privacy and quiet enjoyment of her property.

neighbors.name: Dillon and Chelsea Streifeneder
neighbors.claims: Dillon Streifeneder earned a Ph.D. in history in 2022 and recently secured a tenure-track position as an assistant professor at the U.S. Naval Academy ([history.osu.edu](https://history.osu.edu/news/alum-dillon-streifeneder-accepts-new-position#:~:text=Alum%20Dillon%20Streifeneder%20Accepts%20New,Position)). His wife, Chelsea Streifeneder, is a recognized Pilates instructor and entrepreneur who owns the Body Be Well Pilates studios in Catskill and Red Hook, NY [The Core Pilates](https://thecore.pilates.com/author/chelseastreifeneder/). Although they own property in Greene County, neither of the Streifeneders has been noted participating in local civic meetings or voicing opinions on development proposals [Town of Coxsackie](https://coxsackie.org/minutes/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage them with a data-driven discussion focused on community benefits like increased local revenue or services, as this professional couple may respond well to evidence of positive economic and civic impacts.

neighbors.name: Michelle Niosi
neighbors.claims: Michelle Niosi is a licensed mental health counselor practicing in Coxsackie (address listed in Coxsackie, NY 12051) [Doctor.com](https://www.doctor.com/p/Ms-Michelle-Niosi). She has not been publicly involved in local government matters or made any known statements about the development, so her position remains unrecorded [Town of Coxsackie](https://coxsackie.org/minutes/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Speak with her in a considerate, neighborly manner focusing on how the project will include safety measures for local traffic and maintain the quiet character of the area, addressing any quality-of-life concerns.

neighbors.name: Kevin Forbes
neighbors.claims: Kevin Forbes is listed as a Greene County employee, with public records showing an annual pay of roughly $47,000 in 2023 [GovSalaries](https://govsalaries.com/forbes-kevin-c-182248218). In 2023–2024 he served in a general staff role with the county government, rather than an elected or high-profile position [GovSalaries](https://govsalaries.com/forbes-kevin-c-182248218). He has not made any documented public comments regarding the proposed development [Town of Coxsackie](https://coxsackie.org/minutes/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have the project’s technical team (e.g., civil engineer or road specialist) discuss with him the plans for road upkeep, site drainage, and traffic control. This peer-to-peer approach can reassure him that local infrastructure concerns will be properly managed.
